data.message: That's crazy I was just wondering when 'LL was gonna put out some music being one of the beginning forefathers of hip hop. And he's got dre producing. It's a RAP if you know what I'm saying 😂😂 smdh.........

replies.message:
HOpefully never:

I have NEVER understood LL's popularity.. The guy is NOT very good on the mic and I really don't get anyone that says he is.. PLEASE TELL ME WHAT MAKES HIM SO GREAT??? I've been listening to hip hop for 36 yrs and over that time, It's my opinions that LL, Biggie, Nas and Snoop are the 4 most overrated rappers in the history of hip hop.

I just don't get what makes this guy so "great".. His lyrics are sub-par, his flows are sub-par, he's no activist like a 2pac or a Nas, and honestly, Ja Rule got slammed on by people for making R&B but, LL was doing that shit LOOONG before Ja and nobody's ever said shit about THAT. (not that I'm supporting Ja, just pointing out the hypocrisy).

Anyway, I'll just never get LL's popularity. *throws on his Makaveli record*

^^^ Ain't nothing wrong with rapping with an R&B singer or whatever, and I really think you just contradicted yourself with that Nasir thing, and if you think Nas is overrated, then maybe those 36 years you spent listening to hip hop just wasted..

Are you on drugs dummie? Where in that sentence did I say anything bad about anybody? Somebody should kick you in the nuts so you never produce with that brain dead mind of yours lmfao!! Funniest shit I've read all day!!
I was baffled when I seen the reply lmfao
Either I replied to the wrong comment, which I really don't think I'd do, or there was another reply above mine and the person who wrote it deleted it..
